issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Just attempted to upgrade the shared VPC setup from 4.2.0->4.2.1 the DB upgrade succeeded, however, user facing services remain broken. This exception is found in the logs:
bq. org.jibx.runtime.JiBXException: No unmarshaller for element "{http://msgs.eucalyptus.com/4.2.0}StartServiceType" (line -1, col -1, in SOAP-message)

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.2.1
Release     : 0.0.24112.15.20151116git29b4a2a.el6

Topology:
\[CLC WS CC1 SC1\]
\[UFS\]
\[CC2 SC2\]
\[NC11\]
\[NC12\]
\[NC21\]
\[NC22\]

cloud-error.log
{code}
Tue Nov 17 12:00:52 2015 ERROR [NioServerHandler:New I/O worker #326] [com.eucalyptus.ws.server.NioServerHandler.exceptionCaught(NioServerHandler.java):197] Internal Error: com.eucalyptus.ws.WebServicesException: No unmarshaller for element "{http://msgs.eucalyptus.com/4.2.0}StartServiceType" (line -1, col -1, in SOAP-message)
{code}

cloud-debug.log
{code}
Tue Nov 17 12:04:32 2015 ERROR [Topology:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:Topology::external/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#27] START:DISABLED  arn:euca:eucalyptus:two:storage:two-sc-1/ BROKEN->DISABLED=BROKEN [Action:ProblemAction Code:soapenv:Server Id:RelatesTo Error: com.eucalyptus.ws.WebServicesException: No unmarshaller for element "{http://msgs.eucalyptus.com/4.2.0}StartServiceType" (line -1, col -1, in SOAP-message)com.eucalyptus.ws.WebServicesException: No unmarshaller for element "{http://msgs.eucalyptus.com/4.2.0}StartServiceType" (line -1, col -1, in SOAP-message)]
{code}

comments.body: After restarting all component services all services went to enabled.
